name: Bogged Out
description:
Ludum Dare 46 submission. Theme - Keep it Alive

Description:

Ah, Swamps of Bog, quite a strange place, isn’t it? Danger is lurking at every corner.

And the only thing that can help you survive is your trusty Golem!

But can you stand up for a challenge?

-NOOOO! You can’t just pick Mana-UP everytime!
-haha golem goes heal-heal

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Left Mouse Button - Heal Golem

Right Mouse Button - Heal yourself

Command Golem - F

Pause - Esc / P
